name: Should NOT be able to add a contact with a long last name

methodName: Should NOT be able to add a contact with a long last name

testSteps.description: Should NOT be able to add a contact with a long last name

children.description: Given i am registered in the system as a user
When i send POST contact request

reportData.title: Contact data
reportData.contents:
first name: Cynthia
last name: aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa
birth date: 1994-06-04

street address 2:

reportData.title: Add contact REST response

children.description: Then verify that response is unsuccessful

title: Should NOT be able to add a contact with a long last name

values: contact with an empty first name
contact with an empty last name
contact with a long first name
firstName: Path `firstName` (`aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa`) is longer than the maximum allowed length (20).
contact with a long last name
lastName: Path `lastName` (`aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa`) is longer than the maximum allowed length (20).
contact with a wrong format birthdate
contact with an invalid phone number
stateProvince: Path `stateProvince` (`aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa`) is longer than the maximum allowed length (20).
